pageProduct.name: Oral B 3D White Strips 28 Teeth Whitening Treatments
pageProduct.description:
Information

Oral-B Advanced Seal Whitestrips visibly whiten teeth by removing up to 10 years of tough, set-in stains in as little as 14 days

Oral-B Whitestrips are easy to use, with 3 simple steps to a beautiful, whiter smile.

Oral-B Advanced Seal Whitestrips have new Advanced Seal technology, giving a strong grip and good fit for comfortable use.

Oral-B Whitestrips use the same enamel-safe whitening inredient that is used by dentists.

General Information

Oral-B 3D White Whitestrips removes 10 years of stains in as little as 14 days.

- Removes 10 years of stains in as little as 14 days.

- Start seeing results in 5 days:

   - Removes tough coffee, wine and smoking stains

   - Visibly whitens your teeth

- Enamel Safe All Oral-B 3D White Whitestrips use the same enamel safe whitening ingredient as used by dentists.

- 3 easy steps to a beautiful, whiter smile: 1. Peel 2. Apply 3. Reveal your whiter smile

- Recommended to be used with the 3D White® Collection

Oral-B 3D White Whitestrips visibly whitens teeth. Start seeing results in 5 days. It removes tough coffee, wine and smoking stains and visibly whitens your teeth. 3D White Whitestrips provide you with a beautiful, whiter smile.

Removes plaque where your brush can't reach.

Oral-B: The Brand More Dentists Use Themselves Worldwide

Product Claims: removes 10 years of stains in as little as 14 days

Recommended By: Dentists

Boxed Contents: 28 Treatments

Size: 28 Treatments

KEY FEATURES

• 28 Treatments
• Start seeing results in 5 days
• Enamel safe
• Dental whitening kit

Warnings

Do not swallow. Irritant. Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse eyes thoroughly with water if gel comes in contact with them. Handle strips with dry hands.
Gel that comes into contact with the skin can cause temporary skin irritation and/or whitening. Wash hands with soap and water after applying the strips.
Avoid contact of gel with cloth, leather or fabric.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of young children. Product is not intended for use in children under the age of 12. Do not swallow plastic strip. Oral-B 3D White Whitestrips is not a substitute for regular dental care.
Read safety directions before use.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Tooth Sensitivity & Gum Discomfort:
With all whitening products you may experience tooth sensitivity and/or gum discomfort. These effects are generally mild. These effects are temporary and not harmful. See insert for more information.
If you are in need of dental work, have dental work, or have staining from medication, ask your dentist if whitening is appropriate. Oral-B 3D White Whitestrips will only whiten natural teeth. The strips will not whiten caps, crowns, veneers, fillings or dentures.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Australia 131 126; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor at once. If swallowed, do not induce vomiting. If in eyes, hold eyelids apart and flush the eye continuously with running water. Continue flushing until advised to stop by a Poisons Information Centre (Australia 131 126, New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor, or at least 15 minutes. If skin or hair contact occurs, remove contaminated clothing and flush skin and hair with running water.

Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Hydrogen Peroxide, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Saccharin.

Contains: Contains 6% w/w Hydrogen peroxide.

Directions

3 easy steps to a beautiful, whiter smile:
- Peel
- Apply
- Reveal your whiter smile

Use twice a day for 30 minutes.
See insert for more information.

USAGE ADVICE

Recommended to be used with the 3DWhite Collection.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in cool place

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
